document.full_text: new york city has issued fewer parking tickets each year since fiscal 2003, and this year likely will continue the "long-term downward trend," a fiscal watchdog said in a report released on thursday.
document.title: fewer nyc parking tickets to cut revenue 4 pct: group
lines_and_colors: new york city has issued fewer parking tickets each year since fiscal 2003, and this year likely will continue the "long-term downward trend," a fiscal watchdog said in a report released on thursday.
